article_title: Biden jokes about being a 'good wife,' plus his other top interviews
article_text: - Vice President Biden plugged Obamacare in his latest interview on "The Ellen DeGeneres Show" on Monday and chatted with the host about his honorary status in the "Good Wife's Club." Here are some of Biden's other top interview moments. ()
